backend/main.mo: Defines policy, lead, notification, and user profile types with maps for storage and includes access control plus various query and update methods for profiles, policies, and leads.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, related files, components, tests, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of summarized descriptions for all frontend files including components, hooks, pages, utilities, and constants.
frontend/docs/app-flow.md: Documentation describing the full user journey, screen flows, navigation, and bilingual support for the app.
frontend/docs/monetization.md: Outlines the app’s monetization strategy, revenue model, costs, KPIs, growth plan, and compliance requirements.
frontend/docs/scaling-roadmap.md: Roadmap detailing planned feature phases, technical scaling considerations, resource needs, and timelines.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base file defining design tokens, themes, and color variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/scripts/verify-actor-usage.ts: Node script that scans source files for deprecated actor patterns and reports validation errors.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app entry configuring routes, theme, language provider, router, and global UI elements.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity and react-query, handling authentication state and errors.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new authenticated users to enter basic profile data and submit it via a save mutation.
frontend/src/components/category/IconTil: Clickable card displaying an icon and label for a category.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Top header showing app branding, notifications badge, and login button.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Botto: Bottom navigation bar rendering tab links with icons and active-state styling.
frontend/src/components/settings/Languag: UI control allowing users to switch between English and Hindi.
frontend/src/components/support/Callback: Form for users to request a callback with validation, submission handling, and success feedback.
frontend/src/constants/categories.ts: Defines insurance category metadata and a helper to look up category info by ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppActor.ts: Builds a backend actor using HttpAgent and dynamic IDL, keyed by the user's principal for authenticated calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches the logged‑in user's profile using the current actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, login/logout, and identity loading through a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Loads notifications from the backend actor when available.
frontend/src/hooks/usePolicies.ts: Fetches policies by category, single policy, or comparisons using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines mutations for saving profiles, submitting leads, requesting callbacks, and querying rewards.
frontend/src/i18n/LanguageProvider.tsx: Manages app language state, persistence, and translation lookup.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Contains English and Hindi translation strings for UI text.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/layouts/TabShell.tsx: Layout with header, main content outlet, and bottom tab navigation.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/CategoriesPage.tsx: Renders a grid of category tiles and navigates to a selected category's policy list.
Displays policies for a selected category with options to view details or add/remove from comparison.
frontend/src/pages/CompareDetailPage.tsx: Shows a detailed side‑by‑side comparison of selected policies with apply links.
frontend/src/pages/ComparePage.tsx: Manages the list of selected policies and provides actions to compare or clear them.
frontend/src/pages/DisclaimerPage.tsx: Presents multiple disclaimer sections with translated text and a link back to home.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Provides quick‑action navigation tiles, a compliance alert, and a link to the disclaimer.
frontend/src/pages/LeadFormPage.tsx: Displays a lead capture form for a selected policy with validation and submission handling.
frontend/src/pages/MyLeadsPage.tsx: Shows a placeholder page for viewing the user's submitted applications.
frontend/src/pages/MySupportRequestsPage: Shows a placeholder page listing the user's support request history.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Fetches and displays in‑app notifications grouped with category labels.
frontend/src/pages/PolicyDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed policy information fetched by ID and provides actions to apply or view disclaimers.
frontend/src/pages/RewardsPage.tsx: Shows user reward balance, referral code handling, and reward-related actions with input and copy functionality.
frontend/src/pages/SupportPage.tsx: Provides support resources including FAQs, language toggle, callback form, and a contact form with submission handling.
frontend/src/state/compareSelection.ts: Manages selected policy IDs for comparison with localStorage persistence and utility functions to modify selections.
frontend/src/state/notificationReadState: Tracks read notification IDs using localStorage with helpers to mark and query read status.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters including hash routing support.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Validates mobile numbers using a simple regex pattern.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend UI.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state for an Android insurance-facilitator app, including architecture notes, regulatory/UX requirements, known build issues, and a list of implemented features. Serves as a configuration and planning snapshot for ongoing fixes and development.
